### Sense of Place: Lasting Special Places


<br>
\[
\begin{aligned}
& x_{lsp} \text{   is the status of the lasting special places sub-goal}\\
\\
& x_{lsp} = \left(\frac{1}{2} \right)  \left(\frac{\%_{CMPA}}{\%_{Ref_{CMPA}}} + \frac{\%_{CP}}{\%_{Ref_{CP}}} \right) \\
\\
& \%_{CMPA} \text{   is the proportion of coastal marine protected area} \\
\\
& \%_{CP} \text{is the proportion of coastline protected} \\
\\
& \%_{Ref} \text{   is the reference point; 30 for both $CMPA$ and $CP$}
\end{aligned}
\]
<br>
